meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of a robot.
meanings.sent1: She moved robotically across the room, mimicking the precise movements of a robot.
meanings.sent2: The robotically controlled arm assembled the parts with perfect accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The robotically dancing toddler entertained the whole family with its mechanical moves.
meanings.sent4: His speech was so rehearsed, it sounded robotically programmed.
meanings.sent5: The robotically repetitive task bored him to tears.

meanings.definition: In a mechanical or unemotional way.
meanings.sent1: He answered the question robotically, showing no emotion in his response.
meanings.sent2: The customer service representative robotically recited the company's return policy.
meanings.sent3: The robotically smiling clown gave an eerie performance at the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes stared ahead robotically, devoid of any spark of emotion.
meanings.sent5: The robotically delivered speech left the audience feeling cold.
